stripped_text: Play only if the Runner trashed a Corp card during their last turn and the Runner has at least 1 installed piece of hardware or non-virtual resource. Choose 1 installed piece of hardware or non-virtual resource. The Runner must either trash that card or suffer 4 meat damage. Remove this operation from the game.
text: Play only if the Runner trashed a Corp card during their last turn and the Runner has at least 1 installed piece of hardware or non-virtual resource. title: Wake Up Call
